"Shironian Pandemonium":
"A number of enemies, including Natives,
Dragonkin, Mechs and Oceanids, have
suddenly appeared in Shironia.
This may be due to the influence of
Chrome Dragon.
We have also detected powerful readings
indicating the presence of a Dark Vibrace.
Investigate and try to manage the situation.
――――――――――――――――――――
Collect [1000] Quest Points to clear."
